text: aur yah ki tum unake beech vahee faisala karo jo allaah ne utaara hai aur unakee ichchhaon ka paalan na karo aur unase bachate raho ki kaheen aisa na ho ki ve tumhen fareb mein daalakar jo kuchh allaah ne tumhaaree or utaara hai usake kisee bhaag se ve tumhen hata den. phir yadi ve munh mode to jaan lo ki allaah hee unake gunaahon ke kaaran unhen sankat mein daalana chaahata hai. nishchay hee adhikaansh log ullanghanakaaree hai
